venue.address_2: 1/4 mile South of the Pheasent Lane Mall in Nashua., NH.
venue.name: Roller Kingdom

item.description:
Adult Indoor Roller Skating / Roller Blading
Sunday Oct. 3rd. 7-10:30 pm.
Skate 3 Roller Kingdom
355 Middlesex Road.
Tyngsboro Mass. (978) 649-3440

Cost: $7. admission $3., skate rental.
Skate rental are available.
It is suggested:
That you bring two pairs of socks when renting any type of boots.
Also: If you have wrist guards? Bring and wear them.
Because this is a controlled setting.
No other safety equipment is needed.

Host: Steve Obermiller 603-491-1962 ob@tds.net

Please join Steve O. and friends for an evening of exercising, socializing and music. Don't want to skate? They will still charge you to get in. Then you can just come meet and old friends, hang out with some new people, sit and talk and watch. This is an indoor adult setting, no kids. This is also a great place to learn to skate, roller or inline skates. It is also a great way to improve your skiing and skating skills,and to just get out and about. Steve O. is an Free dance Inline Skating & Skiing instructor, and teaches a skate to ski program. He can teach skiing at the same time he is teaching skating. This is because, skies are just long skates. So, if aske Steve? He will be happy to offer you some free help to get you started. Come and see skating in an all new way and do it at your level. There will be music, and it will look some what at times, like a dance club, but everyone is one skates. The skaters at this rink, are some of the best free dancer skaters in N.E.. They have a snack bar, skate shop, and a places to dance or just sit.
After skating around 10 pm.-ish we often go over to Uno's by the mall in Nashua to put back some of those calories we remove at the rink.

group.name: Fun in So. NH and Merrimack Valley

item.name: Adult Indoor Roller Skating / Roller Blading
